title: "Empowering Health and Sustainability with Insights from Earth Observation"

<br><br> <!-- Adds two line breaks to create space -->


Sorat Alardh is a pioneering startup that leverages Earth observation technology to monitor environmental changes and assess their impact on public health. By combining satellite data with advanced statistical models, the platform provides real-time insights into pollution levels, temperature, and disease risks. Aimed at government agencies and healthcare organizations, Sorat Alardh helps decision-makers address environmental challenges, optimize resource management, and protect public health through data-driven strategies. With a focus on sustainability and innovation, the startup plays a key role in shaping a healthier and more sustainable future for Saudi Arabia and beyond.
